A time-traveling app that allows users to see what their future holds and adjust their present actions accordingly.
A virtual reality game that immerses players in a world where time flows backwards, challenging their understanding of reality and logic.
A smartwatch that tracks not only time but also provides personalized coaching and motivation to help users achieve their goals.
A mobile app thatours users to become more mindful of their time by allowing them to see how much time they spend on each task and make adjustments to improve productivity.
